product_name: SealLine Black Canyon Dry Bag - 30 Liters
long_description: The versatile Black Canyon 30-liter dry bag offers waterborne adventurers an alternative to PVC-coated, vinyl dry bags. Nylon coated with thermoplastic urethane stands up to rough treatment; radio-frequency welded seams offer many seasons of use. Dry Seal(TM) roll-down closure keeps the moisture out with its continuous, double-sealing strips; quick-release side buckle offers easy access to contents. Not intended for prolonged submersion.
short_description: The versatile Black Canyon 30-liter dry bag offers waterborne adventurers an alternative to PVC-coated, vinyl dry bags.
